0010010111110000 0111011000100110 0 -> sum: 1001110000010110, cout: 0
1100111001110010 0011110110110101 0 -> sum: 0000110000100111, cout: 1
1000000001010001 0110000111001000 1 -> sum: 1110001000011010, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
